creditline: The Ethelyn Bros Photography Purchase Fund
description: small shelf with photographs in cardboard folders, small figurine, containers and shell, with a woven bag(?) printed 'Mexico' on the floor; photograph of a group of soldiers on the wall above shelf
markings: \'PLEASE CREDIT/F.S.A./FARM SECURITY ADMINISTRATION/PHOTO BY: LEE\', stamped, in black, on back in URQ; other stamps, in black, red and purple, on back; various notes and marks, in pencil and typewritten, on back
title: Interior of Spanish-American Farmhouse Near Taos, New Mexico
